General.Name: China Wire & Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: China Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum doors and windows, and curtain walls in Taiwan. It provides power cables and aluminum extrusions, aluminum doors and windows, and aluminum curtain walls. The company was founded in 1961 is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 58, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
